McDonald's for Chrome.






























































Here's an English description of the McDonald's Chrome Extension without mentioning Onet.pl:

McDonald's Browser Extension

Description:
Enhance your browsing experience on the McDonald's website with easy-to-use tools for customizing page appearance. Adjust brightness, change the background color, and control the visibility of images on the pageâ€”all from a convenient popup menu.

Features:

Brightness Control: Use a slider to adjust the brightness of the McDonald's website to your preference.
Background Color Change: Select any background color to make browsing more comfortable.
Image Toggle: Remove or restore images on the page with a single click.
Mobile App QR Code: Scan a QR code directly from the extension to access the McDonald's mobile app.
Additional Tools:

iPhone SE View Guide: Get instructions on how to simulate the iPhone SE view in Chrome's DevTools to preview the site as it would appear on an iPhone SE device.
How to Use:
Install the extension, open the McDonald's website, and click the extension icon to access these tools. The interface is intuitive, making it easy to customize the page to your liking.

This description should be suitable for displaying on the Chrome Web Store or for general user guidance.
